articles.author: Filip Cleeren
articles.title: Adrian Newey says he has "no plan" for next F1 challenge - Motorsport.com
articles.description: Adrian Newey insists he currently has "no plan" to join one of Red Bull's Formula 1 rivals, admitting he needs "a bit of a break".
articles.content: Earlier this week Red Bull announced Newey will leave the Milton Keynes-based squad after a nearly two-decade stint, playing an important role in designing the cars that propelled Sebastian Vettel an… [+2200 chars]

articles.description: A Red Bull - Ferrari - Red Bull top three on a Formula 1 grid may feel routine at a glance but Miami Grand Prix sprint qualifying contained plenty of oddities and some significant over and underperformers
